_description: Warning about judges, in a Latin sermon — seven lines in couplets and triplet

CULKk424.First Lines:
Opyn warnyngLond callyngþe iustyse on þe benche y
                    set…
CULKk424.Last Lines:
…Þe dosen þe soþ tellynAnd þe iuges
                    þe dome delyn
CULKk424.Editions:
Wenzel,  Siegfried. 
             Preachers, Poets and the English Lyric.
         Princeton: Princeton Univ. Press, 1986: 91.
